name: Subterrain
summary: In Subterrain, you fill the shoes of Dr. West, the apparent lone survivor of MPO, an underground city on Mars. Do what you must to survive: battle enemies, fight hunger and thirst, mend your wounds, and gather resources in a constant struggle to survive the catastrophe that’s beset Mars!
info:
• 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: PC
